interface.name: 0runner
interface.description:
0runner can be used to 0launch a sequence of feeds, passing ; as a separator between lists of arguments to be passed to 0launch. For example, the following snippet issues two cmake commands in sequence:
<command name='compile'> <runner interface='http://raw.github.com/ryppl/feeds/gh-pages/ryppl/0runner.xml'/> <arg>http://raw.github.com/ryppl/feeds/gh-pages/cmake.xml</arg> <arg>-D</arg> <arg>CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${DISTDIR}</arg> <arg>${SRCDIR}</arg> <arg>;</arg> <arg>http://raw.github.com/ryppl/feeds/gh-pages/cmake.xml</arg> <arg>--build</arg> <arg>.</arg> <arg>--target</arg> <arg>install</arg> </runner> </command>
